about_the_game:
A cute toy robot simulator where you pilot tiny A-RED, a small clockwork operated robot that needs to overcome the trials it’s creator set in a workshop.

The game is full physics based and you will need to overcome diferent areas usually using balance habilities, solving mazes, sometimes pushing objects with your tiny hands, firing laser to move objects or defeat enemies, fly with your jetpack to overcome gaps in the environment or use electricity to activate switches.

Your power comes from winding your clockwork, you will achieve this by collecting the golden clockworks placed in the workshop. Each time you collect a clockwork you will save your progress and wind the clockwork so you will have more time to complete the next part of the workshop.

A-RED will be released for Windows PC and will support Keyboard/Mouse and Gamepad input.

Original soundtrack by Atsushi Moriya.


A miniature nerve-wrecking/patience-proving journey where you are granted to fall… a lot.
